snippet.title: Sol Apocalypse Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
KNOW YOUR ENEMY. FIRE YOUR CANNONS. A spaceship management and combat game. As the Captain of Silver Wolf, command your crew and use your energy strategically. Change your future with your decisions. Arm your ship and strengthen its shields. Survive in the solar system full of dangers. 

Wishlist on Steam
